title: Dreams of the Wicked
description: They promised me to him.Now we’ll destroy one another.I never should have fallen in love with him.He makes me believe he loves me—the only good in a life I’ve never wanted.By the time his manipulation and lies come to light, it’s far too late to shield my heart.He isn’t the only one keeping a secret, though, and mine just might save me from his possession.These men have underestimated me my entire life: a frightened girl who grew into a brittle woman, hungry only for revenge.I’ve bided my time, nurturing my rage; and now it demands only one thing.To bathe our world in blood.Not even Calix will stop me now.Authors Note: The Massacred Dreams duet is a dark mafia romance and includes elements that may be triggering to some readers.
author: Adelaide Forrest
